content.description:
The following question uses a robot in a grid of squares. The robot is represented by a triangle, which is initially facing toward the top of the grid.

Consider the procedure below.
content.question: Which of the following code segments will move the robot to the gray square along the path indicated by the arrows?

choices.label: The figure presents three blocks of code. Throughout the code there are nested blocks of code. Line 1: [begin block] BotMover [begin block] 1 [end block] [end block] Line 2: [begin block] BotMover [begin block] 1 [end block] [end block] Line 3: [begin block] BotMover [begin block] 0 [end block] [end block]

content.answer: The figure presents three blocks of code. Throughout the code there are nested blocks of code.
